articles.title: 'Astonishing' result in drug trial: First time, cancer vanishes in every patient - The Indian Express
articles.description: The new study, presented at the annual meeting of the American Society of Clinical Oncology and published Sunday in the New England Journal of Medicine, would change how medicine was practiced, cancer specialists said.
articles.content: It was a small trial, just 18 rectal cancer patients, every one of whom took the same drug. But the results were astonishing. The cancer vanished in every single patient, undetectable by physical exa… [+4520 chars]
